com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.subsystems

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.subsystems.ResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, IActiveClass, IManager

    public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IManager
    Main resource manager for the engine. Handles registering, retrieving and disposing of physical resources. Basically a wrapper/handler for the LibGDX built in AssetManager

        A simpler way to add a resource From LibGDX: Adds the given asset to the loading queue of the LibGDX.AssetManager.
        Parameters:
        fileHandle - the filehandle from Gdx.files.X
        type - the type of the asset.

        Parameters:

        type - the type of the asset.
